issue.title: [Python] Make dictionary_encode and unique accesible on Column / ChunkedArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2663](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2663). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment, `dictionary_encode` and `unique` are only exposed on `Array` instances but the backing C++ code allows also to pass in the more higher classes. We should add them to the Cython interface so that they can be called from Python code.
